mapper.select: SELECT DISCOUNT_COUPON.COUPON_PRICE FROM DISCOUNT_COUPON LEFT JOIN COUPON_ACTIVE ON COUPON_ACTIVE.COUPON_ID = DISCOUNT_COUPON.COUPON_ID WHERE COUPON_ACTIVE.COUPON_ACTIVE_ID = #{couponActiveId} AND COUPON_ACTIVE.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND COUPON_ACTIVE.COUPON_USE_DATE IS NULL AND COUPON_ACTIVE.COUPON_EXPIRE_DATE >= SYSDATE
mapper.update: UPDATE COUPON_ACTIVE SET COUPON_USE_DATE = NULL ,ITEM_ID = CASE WHEN ITEM_NAME IS NULL OR ITEM_NAME = '' THEN 0 ELSE ITEM_ID END ,ORDER_ID = NULL WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId} AND COUPON_USE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND COUPON_EXPIRE_DATE >= SYSDATE
